name: Octopus Trouble
description:
The evil octopus is caught in the dangerous waters of the stormy ocean and forced to defend himself, he has created a real hell in the underwater world.

Octopus Trouble - A game with a top view, you control an octopus that fights off sea enemies by shooting bubbles and collecting fish eggs, which gives him strength and the ability to live to the end.

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Atmosphere
- Difficulty
